definition: A person who resides or lives in close proximity to a particular location, often used to refer to individuals living near a specific area, such as a neighborhood, street, or building.

examples.german: Die Anwohner beschwerten sich 체ber den L채rm.
examples.english: The residents complained about the noise.

examples.german: Die Anwohner wurden evakuiert, als der Brand ausbrach.
examples.english: The residents were evacuated when the fire broke out.

examples.german: Die Anwohner organisierten eine Protestkundgebung gegen den Bau des neuen Hochhauses.
examples.english: The residents organized a protest rally against the construction of the new skyscraper.

examples.german: Die Anwohner sind besorgt 체ber die steigende Kriminalit채t in der Gegend.
examples.english: The residents are concerned about the increasing crime in the area.

examples.german: Die Anwohner bilden eine starke Gemeinschaft.
examples.english: The residents form a strong community.
